43. Do you recall members of the North West Mounted Police calling at your farm to see how you were getting along? Give any details about the frequency of these visits, names of policemen, dates.

You once delivered wood when we were here; he knocked on the door of our old house with his adjutant's bell. He asked us to invite him to stop for refreshments and not to offer when we answered him we needed no help. No name.

Frank Berrong who settled with us in the '80s. He was an open house for all comers.
